name: Pro Deer Hunting 64
description:
Jed shows you the ropes on how to become a pro deer hunter in this lost retro game. Just be careful,  something in the forest doesn't want you there.

A short horror game disguised as a hunting game. Explore two different forest environments, using your map and other gear to find and hunt deer. After nabbing one, bring it back to the truck so you can display your kill on the trophy wall.

Best played with headphones

Controls

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look

Arrow Keys - Menu options/switch items in game

Q or E - Interact

Mouse Wheel - Switch items in game

Shift - Sneak

Left Mouse - Use

Right Mouse/Z - Alt

Enter - Select
